customer_name: Opie Acres Wildlife & Opossum Rehabilitation Inc
site_name: OPIE ACRES WILDLIFE & OPOSSUM REHABILITATION INC

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The written Program of Veterinary Care form was not available for review during this inspection. It was not present in the
folder containing the records for the USDA covered animals. The facility representative stated the attending veterinarian
just recently conducted a visit to the facility and may still have the form. The written Program of Veterinary Care form
should be kept available so that it can be referred to by facility staff if needed for the care of the USDA covered animals.
The facility shall ensure that the written Program of Veterinary Care form is available for review by APHIS officials during
normal business hours. Correct by 4/30/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The written Program of Veterinary Care form was not available for review during this inspection. It was not present in the 
folder containing the records for the USDA covered animals. The facility representative stated the attending veterinarian 
just recently conducted a visit to the facility and may still have the form. The written Program of Veterinary Care form 
should be kept available so that it can be referred to by facility staff if needed for the care of the USDA covered animals.  
The facility shall ensure that the written Program of Veterinary Care form is available for review by APHIS officials during 
normal business hours. Correct by 4/30/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
